extendedInfo.description: Â«Fashion fades, only style remains the same.Â»Â© Coco Chanelâââââ CLAMOTTY: YOUR FASHION STYLIST!How to make a good impression? How to look decent for any occasion? Clothes can tell a lot about a person. Creating a personal style is not an easy task though. CLAMOTTY will help you simplify it.Clamotty will become your personal advisor in anything concerning your wardrobe. Looking stylish all the time, following every piece of news in the fashion world, quickly creating a perfect outfit, sorting and organising clothes, and even packing a suitcase for a trip, â all that will become an exciting game on your smartphone, which will make your life easier in reality!âââââ WHAT, WHERE & WHEN TO WEAR?Every outfit has its time and place. The system âPurpose, Environment, Seasonâ, abbreviated PES, was especially created for Clamotty app on the basis of an exclusive patented algorithm for outfits design. PES will help you decide What, Where & When to wear. âââââ FASHION STYLIST: FEATURES & FUNCTIONS+ Wardrobe â you can always take a look at your clothes and accessories collection+ Outfits â create new looks, edit the existing ones, view them on full screen+ Wish List â find an item in internet, photograph or scan the barcode; match and mix new garments with what you already own+ Calendar â plan in advance what, where & when to wear + Suitcase â develop your travel wardrobe+ Fashion Trends â be trendy+ Fashion News â be informed+ Connect & Share â discuss your news with friendsâââââ CLAMOTTY KEEP NOW FOR FREE!!!+ Storage and synchronization of your data on our server!+ The use of our services online at www.clamotty.com!+ No Advertising!âââââ PROFESSIONAL VERSION â EVEN MORE POSSIBILITIES!(now in development)+ Storage and synchronization on our server+ The use of our services online at www.clamotty.com+ Help of a virtual personal stylist developing outfits for any occasion with the items from your Wardrobe. System PES â created on the basis of an exclusive patented algorithm for outfits design.+ Your colour type definition for the more precise selection of clothes and accessories+ No advertisingâââââ WORDS WE FOUND:fashion design, clothes organizer, set of clothes, outfit maker, fashionable dress, look maker, personal stylist, style, wear, trends, fashion magazine, outfit manager, womenswear, choice of look, new Designer Collections, wardrobe in the smartphone, stylish girls, choice of dress, mode, menswear, street fashion, fashion shows, designer clothes, fashion gurus, find the outfit, look tips, personal closet, what to wear, mobile suitcase, wish list and others!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I have already found some new outfit combos and the packing planner is really handy. Looking forward to the pro version.
reviews.author: Carol Mansfield

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great apps..let u organize and match your outfit!
reviews.author: Adillah Arshad

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: It\'s awesome and everything, but I dunno why it can\'t find my clothes with the bar code scanner....that needs to be fixed. And it should somehow make outfits out of my wardrobe FOR me. That would be amazing.
reviews.author: Michelle Bailey

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: I was looking for an app where I could organize my wardrobe and finally found this one. I can create outfits and see what clothes I have wherever I am so I can see what I need to buy when shopping. Love this app!
reviews.author: louise higgins

reviews.title: Goos app
reviews.comment: Hi there i believe you have a very good app, i would like to hace t possibility to change the theme/colors of the app and to easier to create more than 3 peices outfit  Other than that good!
reviews.author: B\303\241rbara M\303\241rquez

reviews.title: Great idea but...
reviews.comment: The idea is great but I\'ve been using it for a couple of hours and have already found very annoying issues with it.  When I try to upload 2 items from the gallery in a row, the app crashes.  Also, I find it horribly annoying that it crops the image on its own and that you can\'t create an outfit with a dress in the main outfit window.  I would also love it  if the skirt selection also contained short, medi and maxi option. If these issues were fixed I would give it a 5.
reviews.author: Dolores Gregovic

reviews.title: Doesn\'t upload
reviews.comment: i redownloaded the app following the support team\'s advice, it worked! seems like a pretty cool app, however it freezes n stops if i try  to upload picfrom the album.
reviews.author: Nichuan Liu

reviews.title: Sokay
reviews.comment: Hihi I love the idea and concept of the app,  really easy to use!  But some suggestions,  maybe you could allow upload of pictures from other sources like dropbox, or skydrive.   Also when I\'m trying to Create an outfit,  some of the boxes were already taken for top and bottom. I am unable you replace it with a dress and I cannot case the box.  Please look into this!  Thank you!
reviews.author: Samantha Yeap

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Helps me pack and plan outfits. Love it.
reviews.author: Marwa Alhashmy

reviews.title: organizing my wardrobe makes me feel like i have unlimited choices!
reviews.comment: I absolutely love the app it allows me to organize my wardrobe and helps me realize how many duplicates I have
reviews.author: Irene Garlitos

reviews.title: Changed my mind
reviews.comment: Used it for a while but this is just horrible. Shuts down every time you tried to upload an item.
reviews.author: Denise Pathirana

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: Works! Very cute apps. Looking forward for pro version. I like share option and maps
reviews.author: A Google User
